name: A cat's life
description:
You're a cat.

That’s right, but you're not just any cat, you’re Echo. Someone who was feared both in the human and the supernatural world, people called you the Watcher.

As time passed, you were forgotten, and today only a few remember your existence. To this day, you are enjoying the peaceful sleep you can get. After all, cats sleep most of the time.

Until one day, you get 'kidnapped' by a group of people. Or more precisely, supernaturals. Ordered by some unknown agency, they are tasked to find someone. 

They don’t seem to know who you are, yet.

Will you help them with their search? Will you try to escape, back to your normal boring cat life? Or will you find love on the way?

-

For those who wants to see the cat race: here is part 1 and part 2

You want to report a typo or a coding error? Feel free to send an ask on my Tumblr.
